actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Project Safe Neighborhoods Grant Program Authorization Act of 2018 to support multijurisdictional task forces that investigate and disrupt illegal firearm trafficking and straw purchasing, and for other purposes.
short_title: Officer Ella Grace French Task Force Support Act of 2022

summary.text:
Officer Ella Grace French Task Force Support Act of 2022

This bill allows funds under the Project Safe Neighborhoods Block Grant Program to be used to support task forces that coordinate federal, state, tribal, territorial, and local efforts to investigate and disrupt illegal firearms trafficking and straw purchasing.

titles.title: Officer Ella Grace French Task Force Support Act of 2022
